title: CBAM Compliance Manager | Deloitte Netherlands
author: Get
text:
To support businesses during the CBAM transition, Deloitte is offering the CBAM Compliance Manager, a digital solution for automating CBAM reporting obligations. The Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) is an EU initiative designed to mitigate carbon leakage. It involves imposing a carbon levy on specific imported products from non-EU countries, mirroring the EU's carbon pricing within the Emissions Trading System (ETS) for domestically produced goods. This mechanism aims to level the playing field for companies while addressing climate concerns.

 CBAM represents a proactive step toward environmental sustainability, and businesses must be well-prepared to navigate the evolving global market landscape effectively. To support companies during the CBAM transitional period, Deloitte is developing the CBAM Compliance Manager, a digital solution for automating CBAM Reporting obligations.
